Both MH-III and MH-IV phases were simulated via ab initio molecular dynamics at room temperature. Electronic structures and interatomic forces were determined by density functional theory simulations within the generalized gradient approximation ( 28) provided by the Quantum Espresso package ( 29). Nuclear quantum effects were taken into account by quantum thermal bath ( 30), for dynamical properties and path integral MD, for the quantum statistics counterpart via the i-PI package ( 31). The reader can find further information in
SI Appendix .
